title: Tender Feud
description: Natural EnemiesKatrine Campbell had come to the Highlands to rediscover her Scottish roots. If truth be told, she longed for some of the adventure her life in England had sorely lacked. But never in her wildest imaginings had she conjured a raven-haired rogue as dangerous -- and breathtaking -- as her kidnapper, Raith MacLean.The only thing the young MacLean Laird despised more than the traitorous Campbells was the English. Katrine Campbell had the misfortune of being both -- which made her the perfect in his campaign to harass his ruthless neighbors. Then Raith began to see that love caused more trouble than enmity when he lost his heart to his beautiful, unruly captive.
author: Nicole Jordan
